editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull gives wings to athletes and their ambitions. It provides inspiration to people who want to push their mental and physical limits and share their lifestyle

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Enjoy Red Bull Sugarfree. Red Bull Sugarfree is appreciated by athletes, busy professionals, students and drivers on long journeys

editions.name: The Summer Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Summer Edition with the extraordinary taste of Cherry and Wild Berries
editions.alt_text: Red Bull Summer Edition Juneberry - Image

editions.name: The White Edition
editions.flavor_description: Get ready for a unique taste experience. Red Bull White Edition with the distinctive taste of Coconut and Tuti frutti

editions.name: The Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: A can of Red Bull Blueberry. A classic taste, with the taste of Blueberry

editions.name: The Purple Edition
editions.flavor_description: Try the distinctive taste of Acai Berry
